The Great Spiders are the descendents of Ungoliant, a beast of ancient evil with unknown origins. The spiders are intelligent, capable of communicating with others and devising strategies to capture their next meal through use of paralyzing poisons.
The wilderness is uninhabited land which can be colonised by certain races. Wilderness provinces have no levies or income.
